'''Affluence Talismans''' are an event currency for the [[Fleeting Colors in Flight]] [[event]]. They can be obtained during [[Fleeting Colors in Flight/Flameplume Starflowers|Flameplume Starflowers]] and [[Fleeting Colors in Flight/Wondrous Shadows|Wondrous Shadows]].
